userDatabase

Class BasicUserDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.Implementation
      • userDatabase.BasicUserDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDatabaseInterface, ComponentReferences

    public class BasicUserDatabase
extends Implementation
implements UserDatabaseInterface
    Basic implementation class of component UserDatabase. Implements the architecture interface UserDatabaseInterface.

    Used to store user-specific data (e. g. identifiers, session keys and buffers).

    Author:
    Karl-Peter Fuchs
